result.html: Tá pian i mo bholgI have a stomach-ache.
result.ponchtml: Tá pian i mo ḃolgI have a stomach-ache.

result.eng: He has a pain in his stomach.
result.html: Tá pian ina bholgHe has a pain in his stomach.
result.ponchtml: Tá pian ina ḃolgHe has a pain in his stomach.

result.eng: I am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ga: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.orig: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireanta
result.html: Tá mé níos fearr anois ach bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé níos fearr anois aċ bíonn pian orm uaireantaI am better now but I have a pain at times.

result.eng: I am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.
result.ga: Níl mé rómhaith Tá pian i mo lámh
result.orig: Níl mé rómhaith Tá pian i mo lámh
result.html: Níl mé rómhaith Tá pian i mo lámhI am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé róṁaiṫ Tá pian i mo láṁI am not too good. I have a pain in my hand.

result.eng: Do you have a pain here? What about here?
result.ga: An bhfuil pian ort anseo Céard faoi anseo
result.orig: An bhfuil pian ort anseo Céard faoi anseo
result.html: An bhfuil pian ort anseo Céard faoi anseoDo you have a pain here? What about here?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil pian ort anseo Céard faoi anseoDo you have a pain here? What about here?
